problems.title: Second Largest Element
problems.description: Find the second largest element in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Array Rotation
problems.description: Rotate array to the right by k positions.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
Third line: k (rotation count)

problems.title: Remove Duplicates
problems.description: Remove duplicate elements and print unique elements in order.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Merge Two Arrays
problems.description: Merge two sorted arrays into one sorted array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (first array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers (sorted)
Third line: m (second array size)
Fourth line: m space-separated integers (sorted)

problems.title: Frequency Counter
problems.description: Count frequency of each element in the array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print each unique element and its frequency, one per line
